# clc


## install package

```
npm i -g clc
```


## Usage

```
  Usage: clc [options] [command]


  Commands:

    init                                 init a new module framwork in your current directory
    publish <version>                    publish your module
    build [options]                      build your module

  Options:

    -h, --help     output usage information
    -V, --version  output the version number
```
